org.ipdr
Class ProtocolStateMachine

java.lang.Object
  org.ipdr.ProtocolStateMachine
Direct Known Subclasses:
IPDRStateMachine
public abstract class ProtocolStateMachine
extends java.lang.Object

This class defines an abstract state machine, suitable for both CRANE and IPDR

          Holds the connection to use
